description: A Spring Boot REST controller that provides basic endpoints such as welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller defining endpoints for hello message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when accessed via GET at root '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation at '/swagger-ui.html' when accessed via GET at '/docs'

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns 'OK' status indicating the application health when accessed via GET at '/health'

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns application information string when accessed via GET at '/api/info'
